Focus on close touches and change of pace.

drills.title: Fitness & Agility L1 Drill 1
steps: Perform 5 sets of agility drills (shuttle runs, ladder, quick-feet) for 7 minutes total.
Keep rest short (20-30s) and maintain intensity.
